backend.database

Class DatabaseClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • backend.database.DatabaseClient

  • public class DatabaseClient
extends java.lang.Object
    The DatabaseClient class represents objects that work as a middleman between the database and the user. The methods in this class mainly calls methods from the ImageDAOManager class.

      • newUser

        public boolean newUser(java.lang.String username,
                       java.lang.String password)
        New user boolean. both username and password needs to consist of only ascii characters
        Parameters:
        username - the username
        password - the password
        Returns:
        true if registration was successful, false if not. username must not be present in our system

        Parameters:
        searchFor - keyword or phrase that you are searching for
        searchIn - the column in which the search should take place, e.g. path, or date
